about_the_game:
Adds a costume for Tsumugi.
The following costume is included:
· Uniform (In Water and Dream)
*Costume items in collaboration with art book by Ragu Miwano (main character design)
detailed_description:
Adds a costume for Tsumugi.
The following costume is included:
· Uniform (In Water and Dream)
*Costume items in collaboration with art book by Ragu Miwano (main character design)
name: SAMURAI MAIDEN - Tsumugi's Costume: Uniform (In Water and Dream)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: intel Core i7 8700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 8GB / AMD Radeon RX VEGA 56 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Adds a costume for Tsumugi. The following costume is included: · Uniform (In Water and Dream)
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
